mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT FROM (SELECT V.*, CASE WHEN ANSWER_NUM=0 THEN '미처리'ELSE '처리완료'END AS QUESTION_DONE FROM VIEW_QNA V) WHERE QUESTION_DONE LIKE '%'||#{question_done}||'%'

SELECT RNUM, QUESTION_NUM, QCATEGORY_CLASS, QUESTION_TITLE, ADMIN_NAME, USER_NAME , ANSWER_NUM, QUESTION_DONE, QUESTION_DATE FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, DATA.* FROM (SELECT QUESTION_NUM, QCATEGORY_CLASS, QUESTION_TITLE, ADMIN_NAME, USER_NAME , ANSWER_NUM, CASE WHEN ANSWER_NUM=0 THEN '미처리'ELSE '처리완료'END AS QUESTION_DONE, TO_CHAR(QUESTION_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS QUESTION_DATE FROM VIEW_QNA ORDER BY QUESTION_NUM DESC) DATA) WHERE RNUM >= #{start} AND RNUM <= #{end} AND QUESTION_DONE LIKE '%'||#{question_done}||'%'

SELECT QUESTION_NUM, QCATEGORY_CLASS, USER_NAME, TO_CHAR(QUESTION_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM') AS QUESTION_DATE , QUESTION_TITLE, QUESTION_CONTENT , ANSWER_CONTENT, TO_CHAR(ANSWER_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS ANSWER_DATE FROM VIEW_QNA WHERE QUESTION_NUM = #{question_num}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ANSWER(ANSWER_NUM, QUESTION_NUM, ANSWER_CONTENT, ADMIN_NUM) VALUES(ANSWER_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{question_num}, #{answer_content}, #{admin_num})
